mapper.sql: ID, TYPE, LEVEL, SYS_ITEM_ID, WEIGHT, NUMBER, USE_TYPE, IS_NOTICE, PRICE, CHIP_PRICE, IS_DELETED, WEIGHT1
c.ID, c.TYPE, c.LEVEL, c.SYS_ITEM_ID, c.WEIGHT, c.NUMBER, c.USE_TYPE, c.IS_NOTICE, c.PRICE, c.CHIP_PRICE, c.IS_DELETED, c.WEIGHT1
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SYS_CHEST c, SYS_ITEM i where c.SYS_ITEM_ID = i.ID
and ( c.ID like '${searchValue}%' or c.SYS_ITEM_ID like '${searchValue}%' or i.`NAME` like '${searchValue}%' or i.DISPLAY_NAME like '${searchValue}%')
mapper.insert:
replace into SYS_CHEST (ID, TYPE, LEVEL, SYS_ITEM_ID, WEIGHT, NUMBER, USE_TYPE, IS_NOTICE, PRICE, CHIP_PRICE, IS_DELETED, WEIGHT1 ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.useType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isNotice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.chipPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{item.weight1,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
insert into SYS_CHEST
ID,
TYPE,
LEVEL,
SYS_ITEM_ID,
WEIGHT,
NUMBER,
USE_TYPE,
IS_NOTICE,
PRICE,
CHIP_PRICE,
IS_DELETED,
WEIGHT1,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{useType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isNotice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{chipPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
#{weight1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update SYS_CHEST
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SYS_ITEM_ID = #{sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NUMBER = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USE_TYPE = #{useType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_NOTICE = #{isNotice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHIP_PRICE = #{chipPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
WEIGHT1 = #{weight1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SYS_CHEST set TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYS_ITEM_ID = #{sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUMBER = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USE_TYPE = #{useType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_NOTICE = #{isNotice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHIP_PRICE = #{chipPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, WEIGHT1 = #{weight1,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
